summary: This bill, the Volunteer Driver Tax Appreciation Act of 2025 (H.R. 1582), proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the charitable mileage rate for volunteer drivers. Specifically, it seeks to equalize the rate with the business travel rate, potentially offering a higher deduction for volunteer drivers transporting people or property on behalf of charitable organizations. The amendment would apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
